languages.text: The target suffers −5 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the daemon for one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Цель получает −5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, а также −1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g} за каждый {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} демона на один {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

Das Ziel erleidet -5 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} und 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} pro {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} des Dämons.
languages.original_text: The target suffers −5 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the daemon for one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel erleidet −5 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} und −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} pro Schwierigkeitsstufe des Dämons, und zwar für 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.

languages.text: Une pénalité de −5 s'applique à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g}, à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}, à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de la cible, qui perd également 1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} par {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} du démon pendant un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: The target suffers −5 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the daemon for one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Une pénalité de −5 s'applique à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g}, à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}, à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de la cible, qui perd également 1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} par {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} du démon pendant un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: 恶魔每有1级{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}，受影响的目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}就会降低5点，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}降低1点，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: The target suffers −5 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the daemon for one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 恶魔每有1级{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}，受影响的目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}就会降低5点，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}降低1点，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: El objetivo sufre −5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} y −1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del daemon durante un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: The target suffers −5 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the daemon for one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El objetivo sufre −5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} y −1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} por nivel de dificultad del daemon durante un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: ターゲットは1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、ディーモンの{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}難易度レベル{/g}につき{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}が −5、そして{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が −1となる。
languages.original_text: The target suffers −5 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} of the daemon for one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ターゲットは1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、ディーモンの難易度レベルにつき{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}が −5、および{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g} −1となる。

languages.text: Hedef; iblisin her {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}zorluk derecesi{/g} başına −5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} niteliğine ve −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} değerine maruz kalır. Bu etki bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
